review.title: “As a former employee, I felt completely dissatisfied. Often learned of change and restructuring second hand.”
review.pros: Pros – Depending on what area you work in it can be a very gratifying position. Some great teams in place.
review.cons: Cons – There is no commitment to the employees and no sense of job security.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Engage your talent and devise a long-term plan that keeps the brand(s) alive and your employees happy.
